about_the_game:
Catnip Dream: A Purr-fect Leap into a Tipsy Cat's Dream Ń̶̦͔͠I̸̳̿Ǧ̴̣͑̑H̵̲͖̫͂͜͝T̸͙͙́̈́͘M̵͍͚̋A̸̝̝͆̓Ŗ̶̥̪͛E̵͈̅͒̊!

Jump into the Dreamy world of "CatNip Dream," a whimsical 2.5D platformer where you help a cat climb as high as possible. But beware, the path is full of very scary objects... Like CUCUMBERS!!!
These horrifying obstacles will make this dream a NIGHTMARE if you dare get too close!

Gameplay


Prepare for a whimsical, high-stakes platforming experience!
In "Catnip Dream" the only way forward is up, and your agility and reactions are put to the test! With each leap, the tension mounts, as a single misstep could send you plummeting back down, requiring you to climb your way up again.

  • Auto-Jumping Mechanic: The cat has a mind of its own and will continuously jump, creating a continuous and rhythmic challenge. Mastering this mechanic is crucial to progressing in the game.
  • Precision and Timing: Control the cat's lateral movement with precision. Timing each jump correctly is essential, as there’s no turning back once you’re in the air.
  • Inventive Platforms and Obstacles: Engage with a variety of unique platforms and quirky obstacles that each offer different challenges. From moving platforms to scare-inducing objects, every jump requires thought and skill.
  • Fall Down, Climb Back Up
  • All progress is auto-saved, so each fall is a lesson learned rather than a game over.
  • The challenging yet addictive gameplay will have you coming back for more.
  • Experience hours of engaging, suspenseful gameplay as you strive to reach new heights.

The Ultimate Challenge Awaits


Every jump counts as you climb higher, with everything on the line. Will you reach the top? Can you overcome the obstacles and prove your skill in this whimsical, high-stakes platformer? Will this be a dreamy adventure? or a painful Nightmare?
And remember... what ever you do, DON'T GET BONKED!

name: Catnip Dreams

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 48kHz WAVE format stereo DirectX 9.0c compatible sound board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 8GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48kHz WAVE format DirectX 9.0c compatible sound board

short_description: Leap into this Catnip-induced D̶r̶e̶a̶m Ń̶̦͔͠I̸̳̿Ǧ̴̣͑̑H̵̲͖̫͂͜͝T̸͙͙́̈́͘M̵͍͚̋A̸̝̝͆̓Ŗ̶̥̪͛E̵͈̅͒̊!!! Don't let the cuteness fool you... This game is hard, unforgivable, and will kick you while you're down.You have been warned.
